name: too_often
description: You require users to come up with new passwords very often.
event: Password renewal happens so often, staff are quick to forget their credentials.
consequences: Huge queues start to accumulate in front of the help desk in the beginning of each month.
impress-upper: From a user's point of view, password renewal should not happen so often.
impress-lower: Relax this policy for better results this month.
